## OmvGenericFeatureFilter class

`OmvFeatureFilter` implementation that uses a `OmvFeatureFilterDescription` to filter `TileData` features before they are completely decoded.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class OmvGenericFeatureFilter implements OmvFeatureFilter 
```
